what_games.dialogue: Oh, that's ok. What games do you like to play?

wholesome 100.dialogue: Yeah Minecraft is pretty wholesome 100. I bet Keanu Reeves plays that.

among_sus.dialogue: Haha, I love that game. 'You acting kinda sus.' Lol.

pretty_cringe.dialogue: What!? N-no it isn't. Actually, I am pretty based and redpilled; look at all of my Reddit Karma!

options.trigger: No, i'll show you what based and redpilled really is!

pick_your_poison.dialogue: Wait, what are you doing! No. NO! You won't DARE!

options.trigger: Now watch me whip! Now watch me nae-
Yeah you're right, wanna play some among us?

violent_ending.dialogue: *You both fucking explode from the sheer magnitude of your whip and nae nae*
